title: Jubaer Hossain
text:
Iâ€™m a Bioinformatics researcher specializing in bulk and single-cell RNA-seq, multi-omics integration, and machine learning applications in bioinformatics. My work spans development of scalable analysis pipelines, and mentoring of emerging computational biologists and bioinformaticians. I aim to advance computational methods that bridge biological discovery and clinical translation.

Professional Experience

Founder & Chief Executive Officer, DeepBio Limited
Founder & Executive Director, CHIRAL Bangladesh
Faculty, cBLAST, University of Dhaka
Visiting Researcher, Department of Public Health, Daffodil International University
Instructor, Micro-credential Academy, Daffodil International University
Program Lead, GSA Bioinformatics Internship



Education

Master of Science, Microbiology, Jagannath University
Bachelor of Science, Microbiology, Jagannath University
